message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit too steep for me. I'm willing to pay $80 for it, but I'm not sure if I can go any lower than that.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product, and that's as high as I'm willing to go.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, and I'll meet you at $105. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
